name: CCI Biomass SD
info: Validation of the Biomass CCI 2020 map used a dedicated tool (plot2map) that allowed comparison with an extensive dataset of ground-based tree size measurements collected from small (averaging 0.15 ha; n > 70,549) and medium (0.9 - 3 ha; n > 462) to large-sized (> 6 ha; n > 20) research plots (Tiers 1-3 respectively), with adjustments made for temporal discrepancies and partial forest fractions.
